data.name: Z3TA+ 2 - Xenos Soundworks: Deadly Dubtronica
data.detailed_description:
Deadly Dubtronica contains a total of 140 powerful and moody patches inspired by artists as Digital Mystikz, Rusko, Burial, Hybrid, Zomby, Kromestar, Mala, Kode9, 12th Planet and more. Z3ta 2 owners will find plenty of material here for their Dubstep, Breakbeat, DnB and Future Garage/Ambient-Dub tracks.

Bryan 'Xenos' Lee has worked as a sound designer for such companies as Native Instruments, Cakewalk, Rop Papen Inspiration Soundware, ReFX, Camel Audio, Image-Line and many more. His work is found in the factory presets of such synths as Z3ta 2, Alchemy, Gladiator, Punch, Toxic Biohazard, Scanned Synth Pro 2, Chipsounds, DCAM Synth Squad, D.I.V.A., etc. He is also very active in developing his own brand, Xenos Soundworks.

data.short_description: Deadly Dubtronica by Xenos Soundworks contains a total of 140 powerful and moody patches inspired by artists as Digital Mystikz, Rusko, Burial, Hybrid, Zomby, Kromestar, Mala, Kode9, 12th Planet and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 (32- or 64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080+ recommended)
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
